divs: Sighting DetailsI also saw flashing lights as reported by someone else on 03-03-12 in Virginia. Location: central VA. I didn't report them at first because I wasn't sure how to describe them, but today I saw the video, "Most Groundbreaking UFOs of February 2012" online and saw the exact same thing as the video, "strobe lights over Australia." There was one very bright light. I am an amateur astronomer, so I will describe the light as brighter than Venus when at its brightest (the only known sky object brighter than Venus is the moon). It was south-southwest in the sky and stationary. As I stared at it, two very bright lights suddenly flashed a bit to the right of the stationary one. The flashes were very bright and very quick, almost like a camera flash. They flashed, then invisible, flashed again, then all 3 disappeared completely. They didn't move off, they just vanished.
Summary: Objects flashed very brightly a couple of times and then disappeared
